name: we were talking about MUSCLES
description:
This is a game about getting lost in conversation - about those times where the topic changes so quickly you're not sure how you got to where you are. Navigate the mazes of related words with the W/A/S/D keys or the arrow keys.

Created for Global Game Jam 2021: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/we-were-talking-about-1

**SPOILERS** 

Solution for the "PANTS" stage: politics -> state -> florida -> keys -> pocket -> pants
